capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia has a very outgoing and friendly personality. I just got to know her recently, but she's already made such a great impression on me. She seems like the kind of person who would always be up for an adventure or a good conversation.
Petunia, I just got the most wonderful news - you're going to be a great messenger! Your friendly and approachable nature is perfect for spreading positive vibes.
Petunia, I just got the most wonderful news - I've been accepted into my dream university! It's such a great feeling knowing that all my hard work has paid off.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what character is sending this message?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's personality is often described as selfish. I've noticed that about him myself. He can come across as quite self-centered at times.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out that he's a guy. I mean, it's pretty clear-cut, you know? He's definitely a male.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some magical heritage from his mother. capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, those Hunters' teeth are definitely Hagrid's. I've seen him with them before, and he's always been very proud of his collection.
